overview: After a night out in Berlin, Hannah, Thomas and Nicolás wake up to a strange feeling. All three of them have had the same dream: a voice foretelling that the end of the world would take place on the following night. Under the pressure of having just some hours left on earth, they part in separate ways across the town, but soon enough they start doubting their impulses and the way they are dealing with this mysterious truth.
title: The Inhabitable Border
